Fantasy 











 




Vintage Rocket
 It takes Clemens five tries to reach the magic number. (Getty Images)


    

      
      The Rocket finally gets it done. Roger Clemens pitches 
      eight solid innings of two-hit ball to earn his 350th 
      career win as the Yanks top the Twins 5-1. Clemens becomes the eighth 
      pitcher to reach the milestone.
    

  
Full story Related Links:• Clemens page | Career wins | A-Rod: Wife's foul top | All-Star bonus• All-Star: Rosters | Snubs | Voting | Results, MVPs | Great moments


 


 

 





 Williams sisters bring drama, excitement to Wimbledon


    

      
      Serena comes through with a courageous performance, battling through a 
      cramp and aided by a fortuitous rain delay. Art Spander says 
      Serena one-ups sister 
      Venus.
    

  
• Serena wins | Photos | Brackets: Women | Men


 

 





 Power Rankings: Loudon victory gives Hamlin title cred


    

      Piling up Chase 
      points is good, but Denny Hamlin knew a win would give him a shot at the 
      title. Brian De Los Santos says that's why Hamlin's win in New 
      Hampshire is so big.
    

  
• Hamlin's page | Loudon: Results | Blog |  Recap
